## Constitution Compliance

Review against [.specify/memory/constitution.md](.specify/memory/constitution.md):

- [ ] CHK001 Component-First: Reusable React components with clear props/interfaces
- [ ] CHK002 API-First: LLM requests go through unified adapter with timeout/retry
- [ ] CHK003 User-First: Tested with target users, accessible, immediate feedback
- [ ] CHK004 Cross-Platform: Works on Electron (Windows) and Capacitor (Android)
- [ ] CHK005 Offline-First: Core features work without network, graceful degradation
- [ ] CHK006 Data Stability: Schema versioned, backward-compatible migrations tested
- [ ] CHK007 Performance: Bundle size (APK < 50MB), startup (< 3s), queries (< 100ms)

## Educational Quality

- [ ] CHK008 Learning Experience: Immediate feedback, positive reinforcement, constructive correction
- [ ] CHK009 Privacy: Student data local, API keys encrypted, no PII collected
- [ ] CHK010 Accessibility: Screen reader compatible, keyboard navigable, high contrast

## Platform-Specific

- [ ] CHK011 Android: Permissions requested gracefully, fallback for denied permissions
- [ ] CHK012 Electron: Works on Windows 10+, native menus/shortcuts implemented
- [ ] CHK013 Responsive: UI tested on 5" phone to 27" desktop monitor
